name: Boron trifluoride
desc: Boron trifluoride is the inorganic compound with the formula BF3. This pungent colourless toxic gas forms white fumes in moist air. It is a useful Lewis acid and a versatile building block for other boron compounds.
Solubility: soluble in benzene, toluene, hexane, chloroform and methylene chloride
